title: Agile Evidence-Based Simulation Design Course for Healthcare Professional Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning implementation in BYOD environments for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the medical simulation education design process by dividing it into at least three stages using the AVIDesign model.
Learners can derive educational requirements for specific clinical scenarios with 80% accuracy by applying the LICO questioning framework.
Learners can critically analyze the strength of evidence in at least three medical education research papers using the QSR evaluation criteria.
Learners can iteratively improve and implement at least two prototypes through design sprints in VR-based simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
